author: Matthew Impelli
title: Dr. Fauci Says Coronavirus Antibody Tests Just 'Days Away', Large Number Will Be Available Within a Week
description: According to Fauci, the antibody tests will help to show "how much that virus has penetrated the society," as more times goes by and the U.S. gets to the point of "considering opening up the country."
content:
On Friday, Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease, said coronavirus antibody tests were just days away from being put in use and a "rather large number of tests," will be available within a week.
While appeari… [+2544 chars]
